name: EvaluatedCondition

constuctors.name: EvaluatedCondition
constuctors.signature: public EvaluatedCondition(String aggregateName, String aggregateLabel, Double compareToValue, Double aggregateValue, String displayCompareTo, String displayValue, Reports.EvaluatedConditionOperator operator)
constuctors.description: Creates a new instance of the Reports.EvaluatedConditions class using the specified parameters.

methods.name: getAggregateLabel
methods.description: Returns the localized display name of the aggregate.

methods.name: getAggregateName
methods.description: Returns the unique API name of the aggregate.

methods.name: getCompareTo
methods.description: Returns the value that the aggregate is compared to in the condition.

methods.name: getDisplayCompareTo
methods.description: Returns the value that the aggregate is compared to in the condition, formatted for display. For example, a display value for a currency is $20.00 or USD20.00 instead of 20.00.

methods.name: getDisplayValue
methods.description: Returns the value of the aggregate when the report is run, formatted for display. For example, a display value for a currency is $20.00 or USD20.00 instead of 20.00.

methods.name: getOperator
methods.description: Returns the operator used in the condition.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the actual value of the aggregate when the report is run.

description: Contains the individual components of an evaluated condition for a
